scenes.description: The video starts with a black screen, transitioning into an instrumental intro for the song.
Gawr Gura performs 'RIDE ON TIME' on a 3D stage with dynamic blue lighting and a cheering crowd.

subtitles.original: 青い水平線を今駆け抜けてゆく
subtitles.english: Now, running across the blue horizon.

subtitles.original:
RIDE ON TIME
Lyrics, Music: 山下達郎
subtitles.english:
RIDE ON TIME
Lyrics, Music: Tatsuro Yamashita

subtitles.original: 研ぎ澄まされた時の流れ感じて
subtitles.english: Feeling the sharpened flow of time.

subtitles.original: ときめきへと動き出す世界は
subtitles.english: The world that's beginning to move towards excitement.

subtitles.original: 忘れかけてた遠い夢の訪れ
subtitles.english: The arrival of a distant dream I'd nearly forgotten.

subtitles.original: Ride on time 彷徨う想いなら
subtitles.english: Ride on time, if these are wandering thoughts.

subtitles.original: 優しく受け止めてそっと包んで
subtitles.english: Catch them gently and wrap them up softly.

subtitles.original: Oh Ride on time 心に火をつけて
subtitles.english: Oh, Ride on time, set your heart on fire.

subtitles.original: 溢れる喜びに広がる Ride on time
subtitles.english: Spreading through overflowing joy, Ride on time.

subtitles.original: 僕の輝く未来まわり始めて
subtitles.english: My shining future has begun to turn.

subtitles.original: 虚ろな日々も全て愛に溶け込む
subtitles.english: Even the hollow days all melt into love.

subtitles.original: 何という朝今すぐ君の元
subtitles.english: What a morning, right now to your side.

subtitles.original: 届けに行こう燃える心迷わず
subtitles.english: I'll go to deliver it, my burning heart without hesitation.

subtitles.original: Ride on time 時を走り出せ
subtitles.english: Ride on time, start running through time.

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな光出せ目もくらむほど
subtitles.english: Radiate a vivid light, enough to dazzle the eyes.

subtitles.original: Oh Ride on time 心に火をつけて
subtitles.english: Oh, Ride on time, set your heart on fire.

subtitles.original: 飛び立つ魂に送るよ Ride on time
subtitles.english: I'll send it to your soul as it takes flight, Ride on time.

subtitles.original: 届けに行こう燃える心今こそ
subtitles.english: I'll go to deliver it, my burning heart, right now.

subtitles.original: Oh Ride on time 時を走り出せ
subtitles.english: Oh, Ride on time, start running through time.

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな光出せ目もくらむほど
subtitles.english: Radiate a vivid light, enough to dazzle the eyes.
